items.sentence: One morning, when I woke up, I found that all the bills in my wallet had changed into two-thousand yen bills.
Tom doesn't like taking off his shirt whenever he goes to the beach because he feels insecure about his body.
He had a crush on his Chinese teacher; but what with all the hormones, he had a crush on just about everyone.
A person's reputation can be greatly burnished or tarnished depending on how the media chooses to cover them.
When we started in 2008, we wrote down a list of people that we wanted to hire, then went out and hired them.
